issues.title: Widespread Test Failures

Review test environment setup

issues.title: Low Test Coverage
issues.description: Unit test coverage is 0%, below the 90% target
reproduction_steps: Run unit tests with coverage report
Review coverage report for uncovered lines
Identify critical paths without tests
issues.suggested_fix: Add unit tests for uncovered code paths, prioritizing critical business logic
